heading: A Lifetime of Healing
paragraphs: Dr. Li Zhang is a licensed acupuncturist with over 30 years of education and experience. Born and raised in a medical family, she developed a deep understanding of healing traditions from an early age and went on to become one of the most accomplished practitioners in her field.

In 1991, she graduated top of her class from the best college of Traditional Chinese Medicine in China. She earned her M.D. from Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine and received her Master's Degree in Acupuncture from Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicineâ€”the finest institutions for Chinese medicine education in the world.

Following her academic achievements, Dr. Zhang was selected for a position at Shanghai Acupuncture and Moxibustion Institution, the largest acupuncture center in China. This highly competitive selection was a great honor and allowed her to refine her skills working with complex cases.
